QuestData.Title: Turning the Earth
QuestData.Description: Despite their corruption and madness, the Winterfall barely cling to their shamanic powers. It disturbs me to see the power of the elements used by them to harm my tribe and other innocents.$B$BWe will turn their totems against them! Take my own totem with you into Winterfall Village. Use its powers on the Winterfall's totems from afar, and the fury of the earth will be unleashed on all nearby!$B$BNeedless to say... keep a safe distance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Tanrir's Overcharged Totem to overload 4 Winterfall Earth Totems.
QuestData.RewardText: May the Winterfall never threaten the Timbermaw again. Thank you, $n.
